The genie grants Aladdin three wishes. However, Aladdin must be absolutely honest and sincere when making his wishes.

Aladdin's first wish is that he can become a rich prince overnight. Unfortunately, Aladdin's wish has already been granted by a genie in another dimension. Therefore, Aladdin is still just an ordinary poor boy who still needs to work hard every day to survive life in the world of Agrabah in this universe.
